attributes.action: Reduce the fear of IS and their affiliates by editing and audio or video of them in the media
attributes.additional_details:
The aim of this petition is to force a change in the way terrorist organisations are portrayed in the media thereby reducing the fear generated by those terrorist organisations.

We demand that all images of terrorists and people associated with terrorist organisations that feature on any and all media channels be edited to have images of fluffy bunny rabbits superimposed over their faces and the audio replaced with the sound of laughter.

This will have an immediate effect with the populous whereby we will all be laughing at them, thereby denigrating their poisonous message which shouldn't be being portrayed over the medium of television anyway.
